mapper.select: SELECT attendance_id AS attendanceId, emp_id AS empId, work_date AS workDate, check_in_time AS checkInTime, check_out_time AS checkOutTime, work_minutes AS workMinutes, overtime_minutes AS overtimeMinutes, status_code AS statusCode FROM attendance WHERE emp_id = #{userId} AND work_date = #{workDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET overtime_minutes = #{minutes}, status_code = 'CORRECTED', updated_at = NOW() WHERE attendance_id = #{attendanceId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance ( emp_id, work_date, overtime_minutes, status_code, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{workDate}, #{minutes}, 'CORRECTED', NOW(), NOW() )
